content:
Create an excel table to categorize the following sentence: "She held the book tightly in her hands".
| Word | Part of Speech | Grammatical Function |
|------|---------------|---------------------|
| She  | Pronoun       | Subject              |
| held | Verb          | Past Tense           |
| the  | Article       | N/A                  |
| book | Noun          | Direct Object        |
| tightly | Adverb     | Modify "held"        |
| in   | Preposition   | Indicates location   |
| her  | Pronoun       | Possessive           |
| hands| Noun          | Object of Preposition|
Based on the table, what is the function of "tightly" in the sentence?
The function of "tightly" in the sentence is to modify the verb "held". It is serving as an adverb, providing more information about how the action of holding was performed.
